Description: Rim sherd of North Ionian black-figured pottery column-krater; much worn in places; cream slip. interior glazed with add red band lined in white; on top of rim maenader band, on outside billets. Traces of glaze on underside of rim; remains of black-figure decoration on neck: wing, with added red and perhaps a rosette; further traces at left and right edges.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.304)
